title: AutoEncoder Medical Coding System
description: Transformed medical dictionary coding module into standalone API-driven product with advanced clinical terminology capabilities.
highlights: Decoupled from monolithic EDC system into microservice architecture
Implemented WHODrug/MedDRA dictionary support with version management
Developed Angular 2 frontend with dynamic, configurable data grids
Built predictive search and user-customizable workflows
Maintained complete audit trail of all coding operations
achievements: 38% increase in coding speed for end users
Enabled new revenue stream as standalone product
Reduced support tickets by 65% through improved UI/UX

title: eClinical Suite Modernization
description: Led the complete modernization of a mission-critical Electronic Data Capture (EDC) system for global clinical trials, transitioning from legacy Java/JSP to .NET framework while maintaining uninterrupted service.
highlights: Reverse-engineered and restored 60% incomplete legacy Java codebase from partial source and client artifacts
Architected and implemented modern .NET MVC solution reducing maintenance costs by 40%
Maintained 100% functionality parity during transition, preserving $10M+ annual support contracts
Delivered on aggressive timelines despite complex regulatory requirements
achievements: Enabled new feature development previously impossible in legacy system

title: Major Technology Tier Transition
description: Designed and implemented a cloud-based solution using AWS and serverless functions for improved scalability and performance.
highlights: Led full project lifecycle from requirements to deployment
Achieved 100% client satisfaction
Enabled handling of increased demand through scalable architecture

title: Cross-Product Development
description: Provided critical development support across multiple clinical trial software products.
highlights: Contributed to TrialMaster EDC (React 0.14-15.1)
Enhanced Promasys CDM system data processing pipelines
Optimized TrialOne clinic automation workflows
Established company-wide UI/UX standards
Conducted Angular training for offshore teams
achievements: Enabled on-time delivery of 3 major product releases
Reduced cross-team knowledge silos through documentation

title: Citrix NFuse Web Interface
description: Developed the web interface for Citrix's application virtualization platform, enabling browser-based access to Windows, Java, and UNIX applications hosted on Citrix servers.
highlights: Created unified web portal replacing desktop-bound Program Neighborhood client
Implemented multi-protocol support (ICA, Java, Win32) for cross-platform compatibility
Designed developer APIs for ASP, JSP, and custom servlet integration
Implemented HTML substitution tag system for administrator customization
achievements: 2003 Crossroads A-List Award for Best Mid-Market Portal
Enabled Fortune 500 adoption through web accessibility
Reduced client deployment costs through browser-based access

title: Citrix Support Portal
description: Transformed static support site into dynamic customer hub with self-service features, partner access, and training resources.
highlights: Led front-end modernization from static HTML to dynamic ASP.NET platform
Implemented online licensing system with automated distribution
Developed comprehensive knowledge base with intelligent search
Built partner portal with tiered access controls
Launched video training platform integrated with support ticketing
achievements: Reduced support calls by 40% through self-service tools
Achieved 99.9% uptime for critical licensing system

title: Citrix Corporate Website
description: Sole developer and architect of Citrix's primary corporate website and marketing platform.
highlights: Single-handedly maintained entire corporate web presence
Collaborated with C-level executives on strategic messaging
Implemented lead generation systems with marketing automation
Developed custom CMS for global content management
Optimized for early search engine visibility (pre-SEO era)
achievements: Recipient of 3 consecutive B2B Web Excellence Awards
